title: Google TV showcasing Star Wars content with ‘May the Fourth’ homescreen row
content:
As it did last year, Google TV is showcasing Star Wars content in celebration of “May the Fourth.”

more…

The post Google TV showcasing Star Wars content with ‘May the Fourth’ homescreen row appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As it did last year, Google TV is showcasing Star Wars content in celebration of “May the Fourth.” Appearing now on everything from the Chromecast with Google TV to some of TCL’s latest models, the Google TV homescreen is showing its “May the 4th Be With You” row which celebrates the annual “Star Wars Day” […]
